original_title: Chamal voted in favour of DDR: Secretary General of Parliament
original_body_lines: Parliamentarian Chamal Rajapaksa participated in the voting on the resolution for the implementation of the Domestic Debt Optimization on Saturday (01), Secretary General of Parliament Kushani Rohanadeera said.
The Secretary-General further confirmed that the reports published in the media on Chamal Rajapaksa not being present in the chamber at the time of the division on the resolution are inaccurate.
